basics.name: Witold Oszkiel
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: I am a full stack web developer who can build apps from the ground up. Besides technical I have many soft skills, therefore I have a wide view of daily challenges and problems.

courses: InfoShareAcademy - Django building web apps with spatial data sources
Technologies: HTML, CSS, JS, Python, Django, Selenium, REST API, MySQL

highlights: Developing system to compute large amount of data(Python engine, FastAPI, React)
Migrating older frameworks to React and FastAPI
Optimizing engine calculation time and memory
work.summary: Software engineer at NatWest Group, one of the biggest UK banks.

highlights: Developing microservices in Python(Flask) on GCP(Storage, Datastore, App Engine, Run, Tasks)
Maitianing backend for heavy load apps eg. Empik Go, one of biggest polish sreaming service
Migrating legacy Python 2 apps to Python 3
work.summary: Working for biggest digital content(audiobooks and ebooks) distibutor in Poland.
Working for one of biggest media houses in Poland.
Working in web development projects with Python/Django/Flask, React stack.

Working in web projects (Python/Django, React), prototyping solutions - functional and visual, software verification - manual and automated testing, scripting(Python), creating websites for external and internal needs.
Implementations and training on IT projects, managing databases - data import/export.
work.position: Assistant IT Project Manager / GIS Expert
